metadata.title: CVE-2021-43519 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
Stack overflow in lua_resume of ldo.c in Lua Interpreter 5.1.0~5.4.4 allowsattackers to perform a Denial of Service via a crafted script file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-43519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.4-3
lua5.4 - 5.4.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.4-3').
fs-uae package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
